code: import _toConsumableArray from"/home/saikrupananda/vscode/LiveSites/Visualizer/Visualize/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{clearwalls_nodes,clearpath,randomwall,randomweights,activateit,sleep}from"../clearfuncs";import{wallnodeclr,normalborderclr,normalnodeclr,visited1,visited2,pathnodeclr}from"../colors";var randomnum=function randomnum(start,end){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(end-start+1)+start);};var arr=[],num=0;for(var i=0;i<29;i++){for(var j=0;j<71;j++){arr[i]=[];}}for(var _i=0;_i<29;_i++){for(var _j=0;_j<71;_j++){num++;arr[_i][_j]=num;}}var animatenode=function animatenode(node){node.style.backgroundColor=wallnodeclr;node.style.borderColor=wallnodeclr;node.style.animation="popup 100ms ease-out";sleep(30);};var animewait=function animewait(node){setTimeout(function(){return animatenode(node);},0);};var addwall=function addwall(allnodes,val){if(allnodes[val].children.length==0){setTimeout(function(){return animewait(allnodes[val]);},0);}};export var zigzag=function zigzag(){clearwalls_nodes();clearpath();var nodes=document.getElementsByClassName("nodes");var allnodes=_toConsumableArray(nodes);var top=1;var num=randomnum(5,27);console.log(num);var i=num,j=1;console.log(i," ",j,arr[i][j]);while(j<=69&&(i>=1||i<=27)){if(top==1){if(i<=1)top=0;else{console.log(i," ",j,arr[i][j]);addwall(allnodes,arr[i][j]-1);i--;j++;}}else if(top==0){if(i>=27)top=1;else{console.log(i," ",j,arr[i][j]);addwall(allnodes,arr[i][j]-1);i++;j++;}}}setTimeout(function(){return activateit(allnodes,-1);},0);};
